titles: Jam sandwich Task: Work out the algorithm for making a jam sandwich, put steps 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11 and 13 in order on this screen
Jam sandwich Task: Work out the algorithm for making a jam sandwich, put steps 2, 4, 6, 7, 10, 12 and 14 in order on this screen
clues: Right hand place plate on surface
Right hand remove two slices of bread from packet and place on plate
Left hand hold butter pot, right hand remove lid
right hand pick up knife, scoop portion of butter
right hand spread butter evenly onto slices of bread
Right hand unscrew jar, place lid to one side
Right hand pick up knife and scoop portion of jam onto bread
